weapons.name: FIST
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Hopefully, you were born with them.[INNERQUOTE][END]

[WHITE]Brass knuckles and 100% Grade A Space Marine muscle. They won't do much damage, but at least you won't wake up every beastie in the place while you break jaws.
[WHITE]Your kick move is also a good way to get enemies out of your face.
[WHITE]The UAC's patented Berserk Packs will augment your muscle strength, making your melee attacks deal devastating amounts of damage.

weapons.name: CHAINSAW
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chainsaw -- cuts through flesh like a hot knife through butter.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Mars may not need lumberjacks, but this chainsaw is as effective on demon flesh and bone as it is on pinewood back home.
[WHITE]Keep in mind, though, that some enemies can shrug off the damage and continue attacking, leaving you vulnerable.

weapons.name: PISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Your trusty 10mm pistol. It may be nice, but better find something stronger.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Standard UAC pistol, chambered for the 10mm round.
[WHITE]Good for potshots at the odd zombie or three, but when you start seeing stronger foes, it's time to find something better.

weapons.name: SHOTGUN
stats:
[ORANGE]Fire rate[END]: 10 tics (0.2s)
[RED]Base Damage[END]: 7 x (5d3)
[YELLOW]Reload[END]: 36 tics (1.0s)
[DARKGREEN]Spread[END]: 6.5 x 3
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A 12g shotgun -- you gotta love its spread.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This basic long-barreled scattergun takes standard 12-gauge shells, and has proven itself the best friend of many a space marine.
[WHITE]Relatively tight pellet spread makes it usable even at longer ranges, but it only holds one shell at a time, making it a poor choice when coming under sustained fire.

weapons.name: COMBATSHOTGUN
stats:
[ORANGE]Fire rate[END]: 14 tics +/- 9 tics (0.4s +/- 0.2s)
[RED]Base Damage[END]: (7 x (5d3)) - 1
[YELLOW]Reload[END]: 51 tics (1.4s)
[DARKGREEN]Spread[END]: 4.5 x 1
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Nothing beats the sound of pumping a combat shotgun.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This pump-action shotgun holds multiple shells, but they need to be loaded individually.
[WHITE]Damage randomization per pellet is slightly reduced compared to the standard Shotgun, and the pellet spread is much tighter, making it ideal for quickly dispatching weaker foes.

weapons.name: DOUBLESHOTGUN
stats:
[ORANGE]Fire rate[END]: 10 tics (0.28s)
[RED]Base Damage[END]: 14 x (5d3)
[YELLOW]Reload[END]: 53 tics (1.5s)
[DARKGREEN]Spread[END]: 12 x 7.5
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This double-barreled scattergun has had its barrels sawn down, increasing the spread of the pellets it fires.
[WHITE]Best at short range against densely packed groups of enemies, or just one big bastard. The barrels can also be fired independently through the alternate fire mode.[END]

weapons.name: CHAINGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chaingun directs heavy firepower onto your opponent making him do the chaingun cha-cha.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]An experiment into developing a portable, infantry-level equivalent of a gatling gun resulted in the Chaingun.
[WHITE]Utilizing standard rifle rounds, it fires at an impressive rate without sacrificing accuracy, thanks to the multiple barrel design which prevents heat warping.

weapons.name: BATTLERIFLE
description: [WHITE]The mainstay of ranked officers, the Battle Rifle is a fully-automatic rifle combining superb stopping power, portability and accuracy into an eight-pound package.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine capacity is half that of the Chaingun, so its a matter of personal preference as to which is superior to the other.

weapons.name: ROCKETLAUNCHER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The rocket launcher is the most standard way of blowing things up.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Previously an anti-materiel weapon, this launcher has seen renewed use against some of Hell's tougher monstrosities.
[WHITE]While it can only hold one rocket at a time, a few are generally enough to take down very strong foes, and are excellent at disposing of large clusters of weaker enemies quickly.
[WHITE]Just keep yourself out of the blast radius.

weapons.name: PLASMARIFLE
stats:
[ORANGE]Fire rate[END]: 3 tics +/- 18 tics (0.08s +/- 0.5)
[RED]Base Damage[END]: (5d8)
[YELLOW]Reload[END]: 57 tics (1.6s)
[DARKGREEN]Spread[END]: 1 x 0
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A plasma rifle shoots multiple rounds of plasma energy -- frying some demon butt![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The UAC's foray into limitless, clean energy production did have at least one benefit to humanity.
[WHITE]The Plasma Rifle fires bolts of pure plasma energy at an impressive rate, making it a weapon of choice against Hell's stronger forces.

weapons.name: BFG9000
stats:
[ORANGE]Fire rate[END]: 60 tics (1.7s)
[RED]Base Damage[END]: (100d8) + (40d8 x 15)
[YELLOW]Reload[END]: 103 tics (2.9s)
[DARKGREEN]Spread[END]: 1 x 0
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Big Fucking Gun. Hell wouldn't be so fun without it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]'Prototype 9703' was the experiment that created the UAC's ultimate weapon against the legions of hel. the BFG 9000.
[WHITE]This weapon launches an extremely powerful plasma blast that disrupts the matter of nearby enemies on impact, thanks to a special field generator in the gun itself.
[WHITE]The field also prevents the gun from disrupting the use. when used at point blank range, it generates a devastating degree of damage.

weapons.name: BLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the standard issue rechargeable energy side-arm. Cool![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This sidearm houses a microscale energy generator, giving it ten shots before it has to recharge.
[WHITE]While the individual shots are weak, the essentially infinite ammo supply may outweigh that shortcoming.
[WHITE]Firing the gun until no shots remain will result in the generator needing to 'boot up' before it can begin recharging, however.

weapons.name: COMBATPISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the kind of handgun given to your superiors. Doesn't look like they're using it right now...[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A larger clip and better accuracy are the chief improvements of this sidearm versus the standard Pistol.
[WHITE]The firing mechanism has also been finely tuned, resulting in higher damage and a marginally faster rate of fire.

weapons.name: MARKSMANPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]Purported to have been based on a black-market weapon designed for assassination purposes, this pistol is no more
[WHITE]damaging than the standard UAC Pistol, but it is highly accurate, making it an ideal weapon at longer ranges
[WHITE]and a highly prized sidearm for Scouts.

weapons.name: HANDCANNON
description: [WHITE]One look at this sidearm might have you thinking 'Too fancy for me', but the Handcannon proves style need not come at the cost of substance.
[WHITE]The Handcannon's high-caliber rounds will wipe the stupid look off any zombie's face, along with the face.

weapons.name: SUPERSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]After the first hellish invasion, weapon engineers designed the super shotgun as the world's first firearm designed to kill demons. And boy does it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This double-barreled scattergun fires more pellets per shell at the same spread of the Double Shotgun.
[WHITE]The lighter alloy used in the barrels means that despite their length, this shotgun can be loaded as quickly as the Double Shotgun.

weapons.name: ASSAULTSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Big, bad and ugly.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A drum-loading scattergun, the Assault Shotgun boasts a fire rate superior to the basic shotgun models and hassle-free reloading.
[WHITE]In addition, the assault shotgun boasts a tighter pellet spread, although it has slightly lower damage randomization than other shotguns.

weapons.name: PLASMASHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Plasma Shotgun, the best of both worlds![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]One of the UAC's early mistakes in developing plasma-based weaponry resulted in this weapon.
[WHITE]The first prototypes of the Plasma Rifle had faulty chanellers, resulting in the plasma bolts going anywhere but straight ahead.
[WHITE]Realizing their jobs were at stake, the team reworked the weapon to fire a spread of shots and branded it the Plasma Shotgun.

weapons.name: TRISTARBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Now this is a weird weapon.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Intended to be a successor to the BFG, the Tristar Blaster fires three projectiles in a spread, which will explode on impact.
[WHITE]Despite the UAC's efforts, it has not eclipsed its forebearer, due in part to the fact that unlike the BFG, the Tristar's projectiles are 
[WHITE]as damaging to the user as they are to anything else.
[WHITE]An ill-timed cross-promotional deal with Cerberus Defense Systems GMBH doesn't seem to have helped matters.

weapons.name: MINIGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Spits enough lead into the air to be considered an environmental hazard.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]In a much-lauded cost-saving measure, the design team for the UAC Minigun took the Chaingun spec and reworked the cyclical barrel design 
[WHITE]to accomodate a much faster rate of fire, as well as improvements to the ammo feeding mechanisms to prevent jamming even during sustained usage.
[WHITE]Suprisingly, the Minigun has similar accuracy stats to the Chaingun on which it is based, despite the increase in rate-of-fire.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, it achieves this through the use of a smaller round, dealing less damage per shot.

weapons.name: MISSILELAUNCHER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A definitive upgrade to the rocket launcher.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]After criticisms regarding the standard Rocket Launcher's single-rocket capacity, the UAC Weapons Department developed this model, which holds 
[WHITE]multiple missiles, each needing to be loaded individually due to the design.
[WHITE]The missiles themselves deal explosive damage in a greater radius, thanks to advancements in the charges used, but they fly slower as a result of 
[WHITE]reduced propellant capacity.

weapons.name: NAPALMLAUNCHER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This will surely make a mess![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The Napalm Launcher fires a rocket containing flammable gel which bursts on impact, leaving behind long-lasting fires which will 
[WHITE]continue to damage targets in the vicinity.
[WHITE]This is one of the newer, more advanced weapons that were developed to counter the next demon invasion.

weapons.name: LASERRIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]With no recoil and pinpoint accuracy, it takes a world-class moron to miss while using a laser rifle.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Laser-based weapons made their first appearance in the latter half of the 21st century, but only mounted to vehicles 
[WHITE]that could carry the massive and inefficient batteries needed to power them.
[WHITE]This UAC-developed rifle represents the massive improvements made to the design in terms of rate-of-fire, energy efficiency, portability and combat readiness.
[WHITE]One of the new and advanced weapons that were designed after the first demon invasion.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMAPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]Nuclear variants of energy-based firearms feature an onboard cell energy generator that replenishes ammo over time, 
[WHITE]and this Plasma Pistol represents the degree to which the Nuclear team at the Energy Weapons Division have been able to 
[WHITE]downscale the generator without making sacrifices to the original weapon's form and function.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging plasma rifle -- too bad it can't be manually reloaded.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Concerns about the availability of cell ammo in extended combat drove the Energy Weapons Division to research the 
[WHITE]scalability of a cell ammo generator for installation in a weapon, and the first to be prototyped was the rapid-fire, 
[WHITE]and thus very ammo-thirsty, Plasma Rifle.
[WHITE]The result has been highly sucessful, the only widespread criticisms voiced by Space Marines being that the weapon must be 
[WHITE]equipped to recharge, and that the generator can be a bit slow to do so.

weapons.name: NUCLEARBFG9000
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging BFG9000! How much more lucky can you get?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]After the success of the Nuclear Plasma Rifle, development quickly began on creating an equivalent for the BFG 9000.
[WHITE]While the weapon is equipped, it slowly replenishes cell ammo. Its damage capability remains unaffected.

[WHITE]Users are advised to not tinker with the weapon unless they know what they are doing, as the reactor is only barely stable.

weapons.name: COMBATTRANSLOCATOR
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Now this is a weird piece of technology, wonder how it works?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]While the Combat Translocator doesn't actually damage its victims, it does remove them as a threat, at least temporarily, 
[WHITE]by utilizing UAC teleportation technology to warp the targeted enemy away from the user.
[WHITE]The Mark II comes with various extra modes, allowing the user to teleport themselves around, as well as mark points for later recall.

weapons.name: UZI
description: [WHITE]This centuries-old submachine gun is still in production, a testament to the stopping power it provides in its compact form factor.
[WHITE]Inaccurate at longer ranges, the Uzi is best used up close, hosing opponents with a torrent of lead.

weapons.name: VANGUARDRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]This newly-developed, fully-automatic rifle is intended to replace the aging Battle Rifle design and features significant improvements 
[WHITE]in damage capability owing to higher bullet velocity, but it should be noted that bullet deviation due to high recoil has also increased.
[WHITE]Part of the UAC Weapons Department's [SUPERIOR]Superior[END][WHITE] class of weaponry, the Vanguard Rifle is limited to two weapon mods due to stability issues.

weapons.name: MARKSMANRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]During the development of the Vanguard Rifle, Ballistics Division saw the need to create an automatic rifle for marines who needed a greater degree of accuracy at range.
[WHITE]Fine-tuning the weapon's weight and balance, as well as the development of an extended memory-gel stock that molds to the user's shoulder, created an assault weapon with excellent accuracy.
[WHITE]The 2x zoom scope, while not intended for sniping operations, gives the weapon additional range capability.
[WHITE]Like all [SUPERIOR]Superior[END][WHITE]-class weaponry, the Marksman Rifle leaves little room for improvement through weapon mods.

weapons.name: PP7
description:
[WHITE]One of many weapons the United Aerospace Corporation has acquired the rights to manufacture over its long history, the PP7 is a pistol 
[WHITE]with a larger clip and considerably better damage per bullet versus the UAC standard-issue pistol, and can be fired at greater speed to boot.
[WHITE]Horizontal accuracy is a bit tighter as well, but the sheer power this sidearm packs results in greater vertical bullet deviation.
[WHITE]Models of the PP7 are hard to come by, but prized by collectors, particularly those fond of late-20th/early-21st century cinema, strangely enough.
[WHITE]A [SUPERIOR]Superior[END][WHITE] weapon, it cannot be modified to the degree other weapons can.

weapons.name: AUTOPISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Time to kick ass and chew bubble gum.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]With their foray into teleportation technology, the UAC have come across an alternate dimension with unique tech of their own.
[WHITE]Many weapons there are similar to the weapons of old before the UAC, but have remarkable improvements. Signing a deal with the EDF, the UAC secured a line of weapons branded 'Hazard'.
[WHITE]These pistols have been sought after by many marksmen thanks to their incredible accuracy, rapid firing rate, stopping power and being light weapons
[WHITE]Its fire rate, however, means that marines will be reloading often.

weapons.name: RIPPER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Groovy.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]These unique 'Hazard' branded triple barreled machineguns can tear up enemies at close range, but are offset by horrible accuracy long range.
[WHITE]They utilize bullet ammunition with seemingly greater efficiency than UAC designed chainguns, dealing more damage as a result, but are harder to find.

weapons.name: ENFORCER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Come get some![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A 12-gauge single barelled pump action 'Hazard' brand shotgun, this beast is similar to a Winchester weapon of old, but packing a far stronger kick.
[WHITE]It deals more damage than many shotguns found in the field while also offering greater accuracy at long ranges, but are highly sought after because of their rarity.

weapons.name: RPG
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Ooh, that's gotta hurt.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This heavy duty hunk of metal is in direct contrast to the lighter 'Hazard' weapons, but considering it has a magazine containing multiple, 
[WHITE]powerful rocket rounds, people tend to not ask questions.
[WHITE]Maintaining great accuracy, the weapon seems to have a smaller splash radius than UAC rocket launchers, while still boasting greater punching power than the other launchers.

weapons.name: DEVASTATOR
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Hail to the king, baby![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This 'Hazard' brand double-barreled metal beast can hurl out a volley of small stinger missiles that nevertheless manage to pack a lot of punch.
[WHITE]With no internal magazine, this weapon can be fired until your rocket supply runs dry. Or until there's no demon spawn left to gib.
[WHITE]Keep an eye out on your ammo supply, though.

weapons.name: FREEZETHROWER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]So help me Duke.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A unique subversion to flamethrower weaponry, this 'Hazard' brand weapon fires nitro-chilled projectiles that deal damage to enemies.
[WHITE]Uniquely, the projectiles seem to be capable of bouncing around surfaces, though losing its hurting power in the process. Be careful.
[WHITE]The weapon's perfect accuracy is offset by the relatively slow speed of those ice projectiles, however.

weapons.name: HUNTINGREVOLVER
description:
[WHITE]In the early days of Martian colonization, those hardy souls responsible for terraforming the red planet told tales of vicious beasts 
[WHITE]driven towards the equatorial regions by the melting icecaps.
[WHITE]Never substantiated, these tales caused a growing demand in sidearms such as this Hunting Revolver.
[WHITE]It may not be flashy or have a large magazine, but it is an accurate, deadly weapon in skilled hands.
[WHITE]Patience is a must when using one, as the long loading time demands the wielder make every shot count.
[WHITE]As with other [SUPERIOR]Superior[END][WHITE] weapons, Hunting Revolvers can be only minimally modified.

weapons.name: THOMPSON
description:
[WHITE]Named for its early 20th-century creator, this machine gun has needed suprisingly few tweaks during its long service, and remains as deadly 
[WHITE]a weapon today as it was in the days of the United States' era of Prohibition.
[WHITE]The iconic, high-capacity drum magazine is missing from this model, instead equipped with a magazine far less prone to jamming.

weapons.name: HUNTINGSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]Featuring an even longer barrel than the Super Shotgun, this double-barreled scattergun fires as many pellets as its predecessor, but in a much tighter 
[WHITE]spread, and even does slightly more damage per pellet.
[WHITE]Predictably, the extended barrel also makes this model slower to load, making it better suited for encounters where enemies aren't likely to get in your face any time soon.

weapons.name: RCP90
description:
[WHITE]Originally manufactured in Belgium centuries ago, this accurate, powerful, fully-automatic personal defense weapon saw frequent use by 
[WHITE]law enforcement agencies, as well as less savory groups, around the globe.
[WHITE]UAC acquired the original manufacturer in the mid-21st century, and this weapon was one of those short-listed for reissue.
[WHITE]Due to a manufacturing glitch, the inital batch of RC-P90s were produced with the wrong size magazin. an eighty-round mag rather than the intended fifty.
[WHITE]The UAC issued a recall, but few models were ever returned, and the examples that remain are highly sought after.

weapons.name: JACKHAMMER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12 gauge, gas-operated automatic weapon.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This drum-loading scattergun was originally capable of full-auto firing, but after several testers ended up shooting at the 
[WHITE]ceiling and fracturing their wrists, it was limited to fairly fast, but single shot attacks.
[WHITE]It remains an exceptionally dangerous example of the UAC's weapon engineering prowess, though now only to anything in front of the barrel.

weapons.name: RAILGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Groovy! Wait 'till they stand in a row, and watch them being impaled.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]While the science behind the railgun has existed for several centuries, only in the last few decades has this once-exotic weapon come into common use.
[WHITE]Railguns consist of a series of powerful supercooled electromagnets that accelerate a matter stream at a target, at a greater velocity than could be acheived 
[WHITE]through more traditional propulsion methods.

weapons.name: MYSTERIOUSMAGNUM
description:
[WHITE]An eerie pistol that always seems to fall into the hands of those in need, it is capable of dealing impressive amounts of damage 
[WHITE]thanks to the strangely exaggerated muzzle velocity it generates on bullets.
[WHITE]There are tales of the revolver being sentient, and that it delights in confusing and killing all creatures around it, even the wielder...

weapons.name: BFG10K
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Ultimate Big Fucking Gun. Redefines the word \'wallpaper\'.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Unlike most models of the BFG, the BFG10K uses a newly developed system called 'quantum displacement' to fire a quartet of energy 
[WHITE]blasts that instantly impact the target, rather than a slower moving projectile.
[WHITE]The blasts cannot damage enemies at a distance through the 'ray' behavior seen in other BFG model. in early tests of the prototype, 
[WHITE]the team detected dangerous spatial anomalies at higher tolerances.

weapons.name: UNKNOWNHERALD
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Feeling lucky, punk?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]For every rocket it uses, the Unknown Herald pistol fires a cluster of mini-missiles in a horizontal spread.
[WHITE]Closer examination of the firearm reveals no United Aerospace Corporation insignia, and the UAC has categorically denied ever creating such a weapon.
[WHITE]Perhaps the doom it brings to its enemies is a sign of things to come?

weapons.name: FRAGSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Advanced pulverization technology converts bullets into shrapnel.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Rather than use the traditional 12-gauge shell, the Frag Shotgun breaks down bullets into pellets, firing four bullets worth with each pull of the trigger 
[WHITE]in a spread tighter than the standard Shotgun.
[WHITE]In addition, it stores multiple loads before needing to be reloaded.

weapons.name: QUADSHOTGUN
description: [WHITE]In an inspired bout of madness, one of the now-defunct teams at the Weapons Dept. came up with this four-barreled monster of a scattergun.
[WHITE]A bit cumbersome to wield, but nobody's complained yet about the damage it puts out.

weapons.name: LIGHTWEAVER
description:
[WHITE]An extradimensional firearm utilizing a device UAC researchers tenatively refer to as a 'photonic condenser array',
[WHITE]the Lightweaver strips light energy from the surrounding atmosphere, channeling it into a powerful beam.

[WHITE]While the result is a energy weapon with essentially infinite ammunition, the dimmed view while the weapon recharges can prove dangerous if fired at an inopportune moment.

[WHITE]The secondary fire is even more powerful, but dims the surroundings for an even longer period, and to a greater degree.

weapons.name: TRIGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]One of the deadliest weapons ever made. Nyooo >O.o<[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A high-caliber revolver, the Trigun achieves a level of target destruction nearly unparalleled by any unmodified weapon in a similarly compact form factor.
[WHITE]You feel there might be something far greater conceal within the depths of this gun, but you can't for the life of you work out what.
[WHITE]Who knows, maybe its some sort of ultimate super weapon or something?

[WHITE]Heh, that's stupid.

weapons.name: GRAMMATONCLERICBERETTA
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Not without incident.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A mysterious weapon, clearly touched by the influence of a great and powerful demon, the Grammaton Cleric Beretta has three firing modes: 
[WHITE]the standard semi-auto, full-auto, and three-shot burst.
[WHITE]The secondary fire trigger switches between them.

weapons.name: ANTIFREAKJACKAL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]In the name of God, impure souls of the living dead shall be banished into eternal damnation. Amen.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The last word in pistols, the Anti-Freak Jackal turns every bullet it fires into a devastating explosive blast.
[WHITE]The weight and recoil of this pistol is enough to shatter the arms of all but the strongest marines around.
[WHITE]The words 'Jesus Christ is in Heaven Now' are etched on the side of the gun.
specialdesc:
[UNIQUE]Anti-Freak Jackal[END]
[WHITE]The last word in pistols, the Anti-Freak Jackal turns every bullet it fires into a devastating explosive blast.
[WHITE]The weight and recoil of this pistol is enough to shatter the arms of all but the strongest marines around.
[WHITE]The words 'Jesus Christ is in Heaven Now' are etched on the side of the gun.
[UNIQUE]Hellsing ARMS Casull[END]
[WHITE]A giant monster-exploding super pistol, this thing is as powerful as it is big and heavy.
[WHITE]Explosive bullets with cores made from melted down silver crosses will lay down the hurt on all manner of monster and demon, which is just what you need right now.
[GOLD][INNERQUOTE]It's perfect, Walter.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]With guns like these, no demon can ever stand in your way.

weapons.name: HELLSINGARMSCASULL
description: [WHITE]A giant monster-exploding super pistol, this thing is as powerful as it is big and heavy.
[WHITE]Explosive bullets with cores made from melted down silver crosses will lay down the hurt on all manner of monster and demon, which is just what you need right now.

weapons.name: TANTRUMCANNON
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A clusterfuck of a good time.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Once the energy projectile fired by this weapon bounces off a surface, it will continue to travel, releasing a series of deadly explosions in its wake.
[WHITE]A valuable weapon to have when a crowd of demons is right around the corner.
[WHITE]The weapon has been finely tuned since its earliest iterations, resulting in a weapon that's far friendlier to the user.

weapons.name: REVENANTSLAUNCHER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Two can play the homing missile game.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]These shoulder-mounted twin missile launchers appear to be of the same make as those used by the skeletal giants of Hell.
[WHITE]It appears to have suffered some damage, as only one out of every two missiles fired will home in on targets.
[WHITE]They appear to be a derivation of UAC weapons technology, and it would seem they can still be modded as a result...

weapons.name: NULLPOINTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]It feels extremely unstable... what twisted mind could conceive such a weird device?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The energy fields generated by the Null Pointer deal little damage, but paralyze enemies caught in them for an extended period of 
[WHITE]time, leaving them vulnerable to more conventional, immediately deadly weaponry.

weapons.name: PARTICLEBEAMCANNON
description: [WHITE]The Particle Beam Cannon first fires a minute energy stream to serve as a guidance mechanism for the deadly, high-velocity beam that immediately follows it.
[WHITE]This beam can pierce multiple targets, stopping only when it impacts a solid surface.

weapons.name: PLASMAREDIRECTIONCANNON
description: [WHITE]The projectiles fired by this newly-developed weapon feature a guidance system referred to as a 'quark mind-drive' in the weapon specs,
[WHITE]allowing them to home in on the energy signatures of hostiles after impacting solid surfaces.

weapons.name: STEELBEAST
description:
[WHITE]While it can only hold one shell at a time, this scattergun turns each shell into a devastating cloud of shrapnel, firing more 
[WHITE]pellets at double the damage per pellet of the standard Shotgun.
[WHITE]You feel this gun has done more than its fair share of demon splattering.

weapons.name: SUSSGUN
description:
[WHITE]This monstrosity of a weapon looks like it should be mounted to a vehicle, but it is in fact intended for infantry use, through 
[WHITE]the addition of a recoil-reduction harness that also serves to make the weapon easier to wield.
[WHITE]The gun disperses energy projectiles at random angles and at a rapid rate of fire.

weapons.name: MIRVLAUNCHER
description:
[WHITE]From the looks of it, this weapon was ripped from some sort of mech or vehicle, and is so heavy you can barely wield it.
[WHITE]Rapidly loading great amounts of missiles, this weapon will unleash devastating explosive barrages that will flatten anything you point it at.
[WHITE]Beware the huge ammo consumption.

weapons.name: MARATHONASSAULTRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]A strange and powerful assault weapon that doesn't match any known weapon specifications.
[WHITE]Rifle is likely extradimensional in origin, and appears to be a combination of very modern weapon technology, along with strange alien reconfigurations.
[WHITE]Take care when using the grenades.

weapons.name: MARATHONSHOTGUNS
description: [WHITE]An exceedingly powerful and amazingly compact double shotgun, this weapon is small enough to be used with one hand, and is capable of reloading
[WHITE]extraordinarily fast through some means you can't quite fathom.
specialdesc:
[UNIQUE]WSTE-M5 Shotgun[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]An exceedingly powerful and amazingly compact double shotgun, this weapon is small enough to be used with one hand, and is capable of reloading 
[WHITE]extraordinarily fast through some means you can't quite fathom.

[GOLD][INNERQUOTE]Shotgun Marathon[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Dual double barrelled murderguns? 
[WHITE]YES

weapons.name: WIDOWMAKERSMG
description:
[WHITE]This submachine gun maintains a good balance of fire rate, accuracy and magazine size, but its true strength lies in its ability to fire capsules 
[WHITE]that hatch into quadrepedal spiderbots.
[WHITE]Normally, these are limited to melee attacks, but it seems exotic mods can affect their A.I. subroutines.
[WHITE]The logo for a 'Mako Ballistics Corporation' can be seen on the side of the weapon, but there is no weapons manufacturer currently operating on 
[WHITE]either Earth or Mars registered under that name...

weapons.name: NUCLEARONSLAUGHT
description:
[WHITE]What's better than one heavily modified nuclear plasma rifle? Two, of course.
[WHITE]Going akimbo with these weapons makes for a nearly uninterrupted stream of plasmatic fury, as by the time one rifle has depleted its ammo, 
[WHITE]the other has recharged its cell and is ready for another round.

weapons.name: CHAMELEONRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]This newly-developed assault rifle is part of a department-wide program to develop weapons that interact with modpacks in more diverse ways, 
[WHITE]creating weapons with greater adaptability in battle.
[WHITE]The Chameleon Rifle takes its name from the fact that the rifle shifts color schemes depending on what exotic modpack has been applied.
[WHITE]The weapon can be toggled between its standard firing mode and the firing mode it gains from an exotic mod by pressing the secondary fire trigger.

weapons.name: NANOMACHICARMAMENTGENERATOR
description:
[WHITE]A highly advanced nanoassembler, the Nanomachic Armament Generator uses nanite swarms to reconfigure a base weapon into a wide variety of firearms.
[WHITE]Reloading the gun when the magazine is empty will activate the nanites, which will then pick a new weapon type to assemble.
[WHITE]When unmodified, the weapon will be chosen at random, but the application of exotic mods will limit the assembler to specific types.

weapons.name: LUCIFERCANNON
description:
[WHITE]Another cross-dimensional weapon you have stumbled across in your battles.
[WHITE]A high powered energy gun that can feed directly off your cell charge, and can deliver devastating bolts of yellow death in quick succession.
[WHITE]Primary fire allows you to charge the weapon, unleashing stronger, slower shots for higher ammo consumption, and secondary fire allows you to 
[WHITE]rapidly unleash the weaker, faster shots.The energy core is quite unstable, so don't go overcharging the gun too much, or bad things might happen.

weapons.name: TRIADCANNON
description:
[WHITE]The grand-daddy of all missile launchers, the Triad Cannon is an unforgettable experience built out of three, conceptually different missile launchers.
[WHITE]Unforgettable, because it's firepower is both a grand blessing, and a deadly curse.
[WHITE]It is just as likely that you'll obliterate everything in your vicinity, as you'll obliterate yourself.
[WHITE]It is best used in the hands of experienced demomen or people who should've known better, honestly.

weapons.name: DIRECTHIT
description:
[WHITE]An old, traditional rocket launcher that issues forth strange, nebulous energy.
[WHITE]The rockets fired from this launcher are incredibly fast, and pack a massive punch, but have little splash compared to a normal rocket.
[WHITE]It also seems capable of immense damage to airborne targets, making it great for smashing cacodemons or any mooks you've blasted into the air.

[WHITE]WARNING: Constant exposure to unidentified energy may cause irrational behaviour, misplaced patriotism, and constant screaming about maggots and hippies.

weapons.name: SUBTLEKNIFE
description: [WHITE]A small, glowing blade that appears to be capable of cutting through space-time as easily as you could cut through an imp's neck.
[WHITE]Using this a lot might have some really baaaad consequences, but right now it's really damn good at slicing up everything in sight.

weapons.name: SPECTREREVOLVER
description:
[WHITE]A high-tech revolver that appears to have been designed for stealth combat, it generates a field that bends light around the user when one of its rounds impacts a target.
[WHITE]Float like an invisible thingy, sting like a bullet.

[WHITE]Or something.

weapons.name: DeathsGaze
description:
[WHITE]A magnum that's been corrupted to the point that its actually become a demon itself, it seeks bloodshed and suffering to sustain itself.
[WHITE]It seems perfectly happy to kill other demons, though. As long as it is killing something, it probably won't betray you.

[WHITE]Probably.

weapons.name: HellsReign
description:
[WHITE]This plasma weapon appears to have been partially transformed by exposure to hellish energies, causing it to fire a cluster of energy 
[WHITE]projectiles that are bound by gravity, bouncing off walls and dissipating when they impact the ground.
[WHITE]In addition, the gun seems to radiate some sort of aur. if only there were a way to channel it.

weapons.name: SoulstormRifle
description:
[WHITE]A heavily corrupted UAC rifle, this weapon appears to be powered by the souls of the dead.
[WHITE]While it's probably a really bad idea to use this thing, the damage it does is very impressive, and those souls would probably 
[WHITE]like to blow out a demon's brain or two anyway.

weapons.name: Unmaker
description: [WHITE]What the [DEMONIC]!@#%*[END][WHITE] is this!?[END]

weapons.name: JudgeOfTheDead
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Place your judgement upon those that stand before you![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A super high-tech double mini-missile launcher that has terrifying potential for destruction.
[WHITE]While tiny, the missiles detonate into a line of absolute destruction, washing over nearby enemies and ripping them apart.
[WHITE]You've got no idea what the inner workings of this gun might be like, and honestly, you are a little scared to look inside.

weapons.name: HURRICANECANNON
description:
[WHITE]At least as devastating as the 75+ mile per hour tropical cyclone the weapon is named for, the Hurricane Cannon is a rapid-fire 
[WHITE]rocket launcher that increases in firerate the longer you shoot.
[WHITE]Combined with the magazine-less ammo system, this thing can unleash a wave of explosive ordinance like nothing else.
[WHITE]It excels at demolishing your ammo supply, but somehow uses less ammo the faster it shoots...

weapons.name: NEURALSTUNNER
description: [WHITE]This pistol's retro stylings belie the weapon's usefulness.
[WHITE]Just keep a keen eye on your supply of energy cells.

weapons.name: BARONBLASTER
description:
[WHITE]This heavy-duty plasma pistol only holds one shot at a time, but that shot pierces multiple enemies and is extremely powerful, 
[WHITE]destroying even the most powerful of Hell's minions in one shot.
[WHITE]... That's assuming, of course, that the bolt can actually hit the target. it travels at a rate that could accurately be described as 'glacial', 
[WHITE]making this weapon best suited for situations where enemies have very little elbow room, or can otherwise be prevented from evading it.

weapons.name: BFGINFINITY
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Oh me.. Oh my.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]You don't know what the hell happened to this gun, but whatever it was, it clearly stomps on any theories that disprove perpetual motion generators.

[WHITE]This gun is just amazeballs. Wow.

weapons.name: REALITYDISTORTIONARRAY
description:
[DEMONIC]HELLO.
[WHITE]WOULD YOU LIKE TO PLAY A GAME?
[GOLD]PLEASE FIRE ME.
[GREEN]YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO.
[BLUE]I'M VERY POWERFUL.
[YELLOW]NOBODY WILL MESS WITH YOU.
[DEMONIC]EVER AGAIN.

weapons.name: DUKE2RIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is too easy![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A strange energy weapon with possibly alien origins, this rifle appears to be from another reality, and is capable of twisting our own world slightly to resemble its own.
[WHITE]It seems like you could power some secondary fire modes on it with some of your modpacks.

[WHITE]Pew pew.

weapons.name: LONGHORN
description:
[WHITE]A gigantic wrist-snapper of a revolver, chambered in a calibre too terrifying to even consider. It definitely wasn't designed for human use, at least.
[WHITE]If you can somehow manage to use this thing without it just snapping you in half, it doesn't seem likely you'll find a pistol with more firepower anywhere.

[WHITE]If a dragon man asks for it back, just give it to him without a fight, ok?

weapons.name: DRAGONSLAYER
description:
[WHITE]More like a gigantic slab of metal that just happens to have a handle than an actual sword.
[WHITE]If you're strong enough to actually wield this thing, there's likely no monster alive that can withstand the sheer weight of its attacks.
[WHITE]The blade appears to have a strange quality to it, you could probably cut things that normal weapons could never touch.

weapons.name: SILENCEDPISTOL
description: [WHITE]The sound supressor atttached to this pistol was designed to last thousands of firings, possible through a series of engineering breakthroughs
[WHITE]that remain trade secrets to this day, creating a highly reliable weapon in situations where silence is the golden rule.

weapons.name: STEALTHRIFLE
description: [WHITE]A silenced, rapid-fire rifle, the best thing for quickly taking down an unaware target before they can react or retaliate.
[WHITE]The rifle is slightly more likely to alert enemies than the pistol, but only barely.

weapons.name: SHREDDERPISTOL
description: [WHITE]This handgun takes standard 12- gauge shells and fires each of the pellets contained within in a single consecutive burst, but must be reloaded after each firing.

weapons.name: SHREDDERSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]One of the newest scatterguns from Ballistic Weapons Division, the Shredder Shotgun showcases a number of advancements in shell-based weaponry.
[WHITE]This double-barreled shotgun has three modes, selectable through the secondary fire trigger.
[WHITE]In Spread Mode, the gun functions similarly to other double-barreled shotguns, firing pellets in a wide spread.
[WHITE]In Slug Mode, the pellets from each shell are fused into a pair of more accurate slugs capable of devastating damage.
[WHITE]In Shredder Mode, the gun fires the pellets from each shell two at a time in a burst, leaving its victims unable to retaliate under a prolonged hail of hot lead.

weapons.name: SPEEDLOADERPISTOL
description: [WHITE]This truly ancient weapon still fares admirably against Hell's forces.
[WHITE]Just don't expect demons to agree to a duel at high noon.

weapons.name: ELEPHANTGUN
description:
[WHITE]Originally developed in centuries past when the hunting of lions and bears was still legal, the Elephant Gun has experienced 
[WHITE]a resurgance in popularity now that humanity is the endangered species, and Earth has been invaded by that most dangerous of game: Demons.
[WHITE]It only holds one shot at a time, but that shot is a slug that deals tremendous damage.

weapons.name: GATLINGGUN
description: [WHITE]The gatling gun remains one of the oldest types of rapid-fire weapon, but this UAC-developed model boasts a level of portability,
[WHITE]accuracy and reliability that the original inventors could never have envisioned.

weapons.name: MICROLAUNCHER
description: [WHITE]True to its name, the Micro Launcher is a variant of the standard Rocket Launcher designed to be more compact, decreasing the time to ready the weapon, load it, and fire it.
[WHITE]A Micro Launcher's rockets are more compact as well, flying faster than a standard rocket, but dealing two- thirds the explosive damage at a slightly smaller radius.

weapons.name: TACTICALSHOTGUN
description: [WHITE]This scattergun holds as many shells as a Combat Shotgun, but in a magazine that makes for shorter reload times. With the main weakness of the Combat Shotgun removed,
[WHITE]this weapon is a fearsome and reliable weapon.

weapons.name: FLAMETHROWER
description:
[WHITE]Converting the basic frame and the flammable gel used in the Napalm Launcher allows you to use it as a powerful flamethrower, cooking enemies with less danger to yourself than from an exploding rocket.

[WHITE]Just don't set yourself on fire.

weapons.name: SNIPERRIFLE
description: [WHITE]A tried and tested weapon, the Sniper Rifle is the perfect choice for taking down targets at long range.
[WHITE]Extreme power and a zooming scope will help you dominate your enemies from afar.

weapons.name: SHRAPNELCANNON
description: [WHITE]An extremely odd weapon, this gun detonates rockets within itself, and uses the explosive force to launch the rocket casing fragments out the barrel at your enemies.
[WHITE]While it seems effective, most users are wary of it suddenly exploding in their hands.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMAREVOLVER
description:
[WHITE]While bearing the shape of an old weapon, the interior is state of the art.
[WHITE]The smallest nuclear cell generator that the UAC has ever managed to develop, alongside a super powerful plasma focusing projector makes this pistol 
[WHITE]one that your enemies will never forget.

weapons.name: HEAVYSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A 12g shotgun -- you gotta love its spread.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Attempts to get the most out of every shell resulted in this improvement over the standard UAC Shotgun.
[WHITE]It fires a greater number of pellets per shot, with each doing marginally more damage, at the same spread of the standard Shotgun.

weapons.name: HEAVYCOMBATSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Nothing beats the sound of pumping a combat shotgun.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A bigger, badder version of the Combat Shotgun, this gun is the final thing most demons will ever see.
[WHITE]It fires a greater number of pellets per shot, with each doing marginally more damage, at the same spread of the standard Combat Shotgun.

weapons.name: HEAVYDOUBLESHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]After the success of the Heavy Shotgun, the team forged ahead and created a double-barrelled version.
[WHITE]As with the Heavy Shotgun, the Heavy Double Shotgun fires more pellets, and does more damage per pellet, while keeping the spread of the Double Shotgun.
[WHITE]Interestingly, they also worked in a gas-ejection system for releasing shell casings, which is super cool.

weapons.name: HEAVYSUPERSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]After the first hellish invasion, weapon engineers designed the super shotgun as the world's first firearm designed to kill demons. And boy does it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The big daddy of all Super Shotguns, this thing will wreck face and break bones, and it'll sound badass while it does so. It fires a greater number 
[WHITE]of pellets per shot, with each doing marginally more damage, at the same spread of the standard Super Shotgun.

weapons.name: HEAVYASSAULTSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Big, bad and ugly.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A bigger, badder version of the Assault Shotgun, this gun is the final thing most chump demons will see.
[WHITE]The Heavy Assault Shotgun fires more pellets at greater damage, killing demons faster than its forbearer ever could.

weapons.name: HEAVYPLASMASHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Plasma Shotgun, the best of both worlds![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A Plasma Shotgun that's been modded to fire higher intensity blasts, this gun can melt almost anything you'd want it to.
[WHITE]It even fires more bolts than the original gun would.

weapons.name: HEAVYHUNTINGSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]A bigger, badder version of the Hunting Shotgun, this gun is the final thing most chump demons will see.
[WHITE]The Heavy Hunting Shotgun fires more pellets at greater damage, whilst retaining the tight pellet spread the Hunting Shotgun is known for.
[WHITE]The scattergun of choice for when tough hellspawn just won't go down quietly.

weapons.name: PIERCINGCHAINSAW
description:
[WHITE]Even exotic alloys have their limits, as Marines using melee weapons quickly discovered.
[WHITE]To meet the needs of those desiring close- quarters combat weapons, a team at the Weapons Dept. set about developing bladed weapons that utilize nanoassemblers to keep the blade honed.
[WHITE]This Chainsaw was one of the early entries in the line.
[WHITE]An unexpected benefit of nanomachic maintanence is that the teeth are so finely formed, they pierce armor, making the Nanoedge Saw an excellent choice when facing thicker-skinned hellspawn at close range.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERPISTOL
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Pistol is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERCHAINGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chaingun directs heavy firepower onto your opponent making him do the chaingun cha-cha.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Chaingun is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERBATTLERIFLE
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Battle Rifle is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A plasma rifle shoots multiple rounds of plasma energy -- frying some demon butt![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Plasma Rifle is tuned for greater damage per bolt, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from the capacitors than before, and so can't fire as much before needing reloading.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERBFG9000
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Big Fucking Gun. Hell wouldn't be so fun without it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this BFG 9000 is tuned for greater damage per blast, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from the capacitors than before, and so can't fire as much before needing reloading.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the standard issue rechargeable energy side-arm. Cool![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Blaster is tuned for greater damage per laser, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from the capacitors than before, and so can't fire as much before needing recharging.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERCOMBATPISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the kind of handgun given to your superiors. Doesn't look like they're using it right now...[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Combat Pistol is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERMARKSMANPISTOL
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Marksman Pistol is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERHANDCANNON
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Handcannon is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERTRISTARBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Now this is a weird weapon.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Tristar Blaster is tuned for greater damage per bolt, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from the capacitors than before, and so can't fire as much before needing reloading.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERMINIGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Spits enough lead into the air to be considered an environmental hazard.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Minigun is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERLASERRIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]With no recoil and pinpoint accuracy, it takes a world-class moron to miss while using a laser rifle.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Laser Rifle is tuned for greater damage per laser, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from the capacitors than before, and so can't fire as much before needing reloading.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERNUCLEARPLASMAPISTOL
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Nuclear Plasma Pistol is tuned for greater damage per bolt, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from its capacitors than before, and thus can't fire as much before needing to recharge.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERNUCLEARPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging plasma rifle -- too bad it can't be manually reloaded.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Nuclear Plasma Rifle is tuned for greater damage per bolt, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the weapon draws far more power from its capacitors than before, and thus can't fire as much before needing to recharge.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERNUCLEARBFG9000
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging BFG9000! How much more lucky can you get?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Nuclear BFG 9000 was part of the 'High Power' line of UAC weapons, but is no longer produced.
[WHITE]A catastrophic fault in the nuclear reactor was discovered after release, forcing UAC to issue a recall.
[WHITE]Several BFGs detonated in small nuclear explosions, causing a great deal of damage to UAC infrastructure, and caused great public outrage as well.
[WHITE]The UAC has disavowed all legal responsibility regarding the use of this BFG model, and it commands a high price on the black market.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERUZI
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Uzi is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERVANGUARDRIFLE
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Vanguard Rifle is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERMARKSMANRIFLE
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Marksman Rifle is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERHUNTINGREVOLVER
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Hunting Revolver is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERTHOMPSON
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this Tommygun is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically decreased.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERPP7
description: [WHITE]Part of the 'High-Power' line of UAC weapons, this PP7 is tuned for greater damage per bullet, without sacrificing accuracy.
[WHITE]Unfortunately, the magazine size is dramatically reduced.

weapons.name: HIGHPOWERRCP90
description:
[WHITE]A powerful submachinegun from advanced tech manufacturer Chesluk Industries, the RC-P120 is a monstrous bullethose that can unleash 
[WHITE]an huge amount of lead downrange without even trying.
[WHITE]In addition to the massive mag, the weapon has an advanced light-refracting device built into it that uses the weapon's ammunition to power itself.
[WHITE]Pressing the secondary fire trigger activates and deactivates the cloaking device, and firing the weapon deactivates it as well.
[WHITE]While unproven, it is widely believed that Chesluk Industries is actually a front for another dark, shadowy corporation.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A 12g shotgun -- you gotta love its spread.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert 
[WHITE]them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELCOMBATSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Nothing beats the sound of pumping a combat shotgun.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Combat Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert 
[WHITE]them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELDOUBLESHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Double Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert 
them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELSUPERSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]After the first hellish invasion, weapon engineers designed the super shotgun as the world's first firearm designed to kill demons. And boy does it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Super Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert 
[WHITE]them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELASSAULTSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Big, bad and ugly.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Assault Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert 
[WHITE]them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELPLASMASHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Plasma Shotgun, the best of both worlds![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Plasma Shotgun has been tuned to fire extremely deadly bolts that even blast nearby enemies slightly.
[WHITE]The gun seems safe, but make sure you don't burn your hands after continuous fire.

weapons.name: PLASMATICSHRAPNELHUNTINGSHOTGUN
description: [WHITE]Despite its exterior, this Hunting Shotgun is part of the 'Plasmatic' line of UAC weapons, a series of scatterguns which take standard shells and convert
[WHITE]them into a spread of energy bursts.

weapons.name: PLASMASPLITTER
description:
[WHITE]A plasma rifle designed to refract its energy blasts all over the place, resulting in a spectacular but largely inefficient display of firepower.
[WHITE]Each point of damage a normal plasma rifle would do causes this to fire that many single-damage tiny blasts, overwhelming enemies with a mass of glowing blue death.

weapons.name: LASERSPLITTER
description:
[WHITE]A laser rifle designed to refract its energy blasts all over the place, resulting in a spectacular but largely inefficient display of firepower.
[WHITE]Each point of damage a normal laser rifle would do causes this to fire that many single-damage tiny blasts, overwhelming enemies with a mass of glowing red death.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMASPLITTER
description:
[WHITE]A nuclear plasma rifle designed to refract its energy blasts all over the place, resulting in a spectacular but largely inefficient display of firepower.
[WHITE]Each point of damage a normal plasma rifle would do causes this to fire that many single-damage tiny blasts, overwhelming enemies with a mass of glowing blue death.

weapons.name: DOUBLECHAINSAW
description: [WHITE]If one's good, two's even better.
[WHITE]This Chainsaw has been modified to support an additional blade, making it useless for the purpose of cutting trees, but much better for cutting into the demonic hordes.

weapons.name: TACTICALROCKETLAUNCHER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The rocket launcher is the most standard way of blowing things up.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Unbeknownst to the team developing the Missile Launcher, another team within the Weapons Dept. was developing this successor to the original 
[WHITE]Rocket Launcher. While its fire rate is slightly less than the Missile Launcher, the Tactical Rocket Launcher's magazine design enables rockets 
[WHITE]to be reloaded at a significantly faster rate.
[WHITE]Cost-saving measures initiated during development unfortunately mean the Tactical Rocket Launcher uses an older rocket design containing an 
[WHITE]explosive charge that does the same damage as its successor, but in a smaller radius.

weapons.name: STORMPISTOL
description: [WHITE]This Pistol is the first in the 'Storm' line of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Like all the ballistic weapons in the line, this Pistol divides bullets into a pair of pellets before firing them, creating a shotgun-like weapon in a pistol form factor.

weapons.name: STORMCOMBATPISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the kind of handgun given to your superiors. Doesn't look like they're using it right now...[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Combat Pistol is part of the 'Storm' line of UAC weapons, firing a pair of pellets formed from bullets with each trigger pull.
[WHITE]Like all Combat Pistols, a larger clip is the main improvement over the Storm Pistol.

weapons.name: STORMMARKSMANPISTOL
description: [WHITE]This Marksman Pistol is part of the 'Storm' line of UAC weapons, firing a pair of pellets formed from bullets with each trigger pull.
[WHITE]Like all Marksman Pistols, greater accuracy is the main improvement over the Storm Pistol.

weapons.name: STORMHANDCANNON
description: [WHITE]This Handcannon is part of the 'Storm' line of UAC weapons, firing a pair of pellets formed from bullets with each trigger pull.
[WHITE]Like all Handcannons, the 'Storm' variant is higher caliber and higher damage.

weapons.name: STORMUZI
description: [WHITE]Two pistols would spit more lead than one, and therefore two Uzis will unleash an almighty wall of lead at your foes.
[WHITE]Of course, firing these will drop your accuracy and your ammo stockpiles by a considerable amount.

weapons.name: STORMBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the standard issue rechargeable energy side-arm. Cool![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The first of two energy weapons in the 'Storm' line, the Storm Blaster fires two laser blasts simultaneously at a cost of only one charge, 
[WHITE]and features a higher-capacity generator than the standard Blaster.

weapons.name: STORMNUCLEARPLASMAPISTOL
description: [WHITE]The last in the 'Storm' line of firearms became a rare cooperative effort between two teams at the Weapons Dept, resulting in a
[WHITE]Plasma Pistol variant with the multi-shot capability of a Storm weapon and the ammo recharging of a Nuclear weapon.

weapons.name: PLASMAPISTOL
description: [WHITE]Experiments into creating scalar plasma weapon technology resulted in the Plasma Pistol.
[WHITE]The shots are much more damaging than the Plasma Rifle's, but they are much slower to fire.

weapons.name: PLASMACOMBATPISTOL
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the kind of handgun given to your superiors. Doesn't look like they're using it right now...[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Not content with the original, the team that created the Plasma Pistol turned out this Combat version in record time, 
[WHITE]featuring a higher capacity cell for more shots in between reloads and better fire rate.

weapons.name: PLASMAMARKSMANPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]Not content with the original, the team that created the Plasma Pistol also released this Marksman version, 
[WHITE]featuring a highly focused emitter that can unleash plasma at incredible speed.

[WHITE]Also looks really cool.

weapons.name: PLASMAHANDCANNON
description:
[WHITE]Never satisfied, the developers of the Plasma Pistol and Plasma Combat Pistol moved on to the Handcannon variant, 
[WHITE]continuing the trend of powerful energy-based weapons with the compact size of a sidearm.
[WHITE]The stopping power of this weapon is incredible.

weapons.name: PLASMAUZI
description:
[WHITE]While not technically a submachine gun, as there are no moving parts involved in the firing mechanism, the Plasma Uzi has 
[WHITE]silenced the would-be pedants at the UAC Weapons Dept. and elsewhere through sheer firepower.
[WHITE]Accuracy continues to be an issue at this rate-of-fire, but the Plasma Uzi remains a hot item with those able to afford its high price tag.

weapons.name: OVERCHARGEDBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the standard issue rechargeable energy side-arm. Cool![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]In their efforts to create the most powerful handgun possible, a team within the Energy Weapons Division started with the Blaster, 
[WHITE]and ended up with this. The Overcharged Blaster must recharge after every shot, but those shots are devastating beams unthinkable from 
[WHITE]an energy weapon of this size, stopping most low to mid-level demons dead within a few deadly shots.

weapons.name: SUPERCHARGEDNUCLEARPLASMAPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]Another attempt to create energy based firearms as compact and deadly as possible resulted in this Plasma Pistol as redesigned by the Nuclear team.
[WHITE]While each shot does less initial damage than those fired by an Overcharged Blaster, the bolts it fires explode on impact, dispersing energy and damaging foes close by.
[WHITE]The Supercharged Nuclear Plasma Pistol can be charged up to fire extremely powerful blasts, but you have to make sure not to charge beyond your current ammo capacity.

weapons.name: VBFG9000
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Big Fucking Gun. Hell wouldn't be so fun without it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]A new model of the classic BFG, the VBFG 9000 features an upgrade in the damage dealt by the projectile and the number of targets it can hit.
[WHITE]The sleek, well-machined housing of the gun has won over fans of the original BFG as well.

[WHITE]Mind the increased charge time, however.

weapons.name: NUCLEARVBFG9000
description: [DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging BFG9000! How much more lucky can you get?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The Nuclear variant of the VBFG 9000 retains the capabilities of the standard VBFG, adding a nuclear reactor that slowly replenishes the gun's ammo when it's equipped and idling.

weapons.name: FOCUSEDDOUBLESHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This double-barrelled shotgun has had a choke mechanism installed on it, significantly reducing pellet spread and making it a handy weapon on smaller, tougher targets.
[WHITE]All the shots hitting the same point makes it do more damage too.

weapons.name: HYPERBLASTER
description:
[WHITE]Despite the name, this isn't a Blaster variant, but instead a fork of the Plasma Rifle program, resulting in a weapon 
[WHITE]that doesn't require cooling and has improved accuracy and projectile speed.
[WHITE]An excellent precision weapon, often overlooked by marines in search of heavy firepower, but the increased agility makes it far more effective than you might think.

weapons.name: BULLETSTORMCHAINGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chaingun directs heavy firepower onto your opponent making him do the chaingun cha-cha.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]In addition to the slight damage increase per-bullet over the standard Chaingun, the Bulletstorm Chaingun's sequential magazine design 
[WHITE]means that instead of reloading it in the traditional manner, you simply add more magazines as it ejects empties.
[WHITE]It will continue to fire until you let off the trigger, or you've run out of ammo.
[WHITE]Good in dire situations where reloading equals death, bad in dire situations where you must watch every bullet.

weapons.name: BULLETSTORMRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]In addition to the slight damage increase per-bullet over the standard Battle Rifle, the Bulletstorm Rifle's twin drum magazines 
[WHITE]enable the user to utilize their full supply of bullets, without ever needing to reload.
[WHITE]The weapon of choice for when only an uninterrupted hail of bullets will do.

weapons.name: AUTOSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Nothing beats the sound of pumping a combat shotgun.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Not content with shotguns such as the Combat, Tactical and Assault models, a team within the Weapons Dept. strove for an automatic scattergun 
[WHITE]with a fire rate as fast as the laws of physics would allow, and created the Autoshotgun.
[WHITE]Its large magazine is a blessing given its rapid fire rate, but the recoil was an issue the team could not stamp out.

weapons.name: AUTODOUBLESHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]Quite possibly the pinnacle of traditional ballistic shotgun design, this full-auto firing, double-barreled, belt-fed scattergun is a 
[WHITE]devastating addition to any demon-killing Space Marine's arsenal.
[WHITE]The strong recoil during continous fire is probably a small price to pay for this kind of firepower, but make sure you don't propel yourself into a lava pit!

weapons.name: MINIMISSILEPISTOL
description: [WHITE]An advancement of 20th-century 'Gyrojet' technology, this sidearm fires self-propelled explosives that retain a stable trajectory even at longer ranges.

weapons.name: PLASMARIFLEMKII
description: [DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A plasma rifle shoots multiple rounds of plasma energy -- frying some demon butt![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This redesign of the classic Plasma Rifle resulted in a weapon with a slightly decreased fire rate, but more damaging plasma bolts, and a far greater capacity.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMARIFLEMKII
description: [WHITE]Adapting the Nuclear Plasma Rifle to use the improvements of the normal Mk. II rifle was quite difficult, but eventually the Nuclear team succeeded.
[WHITE]A powerful weapon that, when used accordingly, can turn the tide of any battle.

weapons.name: PLASMASHOTGUNMKII
description:
[WHITE]Attempts to upgrade the Plasma Shotgun all ended in failure, so it had to be taken apart and put back together in a similar 
[WHITE]configuration before any progress could be made.
[WHITE]The discharges made from firing the shotgun are so strong they blast back any enemies that are up in your face.

weapons.name: NUCLEARPLASMASHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]During the stalled development of the Plasma Shotgun Mk.II, several engineers collaborated with the Nuclear Division to create 
[WHITE]a Nuclear upgrade for the original Plasma Shotgun.
[WHITE]The resulting weapon is no more damaging, but the cell ammo regeneration has made it an easy sell to the value-minded Marine.

weapons.name: LASERSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]While developing the Laser Rifle, a divide grew between the R&D team members working on it.
[WHITE]One group felt that the best way to increase damage output would be to fire faster. Ergo, the Laser Minigun.
[WHITE]But the other half felt that you could shoot even faster than that. all at once.
[WHITE]Thus the Laser Shotgun was born.

[WHITE]For some reason, many people hate the concept of a laser shotgun, and it is a source of eternal arguments.

weapons.name: GRENADELAUNCHER
description:
[WHITE]The rocket-propelled explosives this weapon fires can be bounced off walls, over barriers and around corners, 
[WHITE]enabling skilled users to eliminate enemies before they can retaliate, and enabling unskilled users to bounce explosives 
[WHITE]right back into their own faces, for a quick and ignominious death.
[WHITE]You have been warned.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLECHAINGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chaingun directs heavy firepower onto your opponent making him do the chaingun cha-cha.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The UAC's 'Assault' line of weapons are fine-tuned for better damage and accuracy at the cost of rate-of-fire, and the Assault Chaingun is an excellent example.
[WHITE]A prime choice when pinpoint accuracy at greater distances is required.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLEBATTLERIFLE
description:
[WHITE]To develop an 'Assault' version of a weapon prized for its high rate-of-fire seems counter-productive, 
[WHITE]but the Scoped Rifle remains a desirable weapon due to its accuracy and damage upgrades.
[WHITE]A scope for zooming adds to the usefulness of this weapon.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLEPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A plasma rifle shoots multiple rounds of plasma energy -- frying some demon butt![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]As with other weapons in the UAC 'Assault' line, the Assault Plasma Rifle is designed for damage output and range, at the cost of rate-of-fire.
[WHITE]The plasma bolts it fires deal more damage and travel at a much greater velocity.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLEMINIGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Spits enough lead into the air to be considered an environmental hazard.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]To develop an 'Assault' version of a weapon prized for its high rate-of-fire seems counter-productive, but the Assault Minigun remains a 
[WHITE]desirable weapon due to its accuracy and damage upgrades.
[WHITE]The incredible magazine of ammo available to the weapon allows you to keep a huge reserve of high damage accurate shots ready without impacting your ammo reserves.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLELASERRIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]With no recoil and pinpoint accuracy, it takes a world-class moron to miss while using a laser rifle.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]For the Assault Laser Rifle, the Energy Weapons Division dropped the gain limiters featured on the standard model, creating a laser rifle 
[WHITE]with a reduced fire rate but severely increased damage.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLENUCLEARPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging plasma rifle -- too bad it can't be manually reloaded.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]For the Assault Nuclear Plasma Rifle, the Energy Weapons Division added a series of amplifiers that greatly enhance the power of the weapon, 
[WHITE]allowing the slow trickle of power to not be completely drained by each shot. Early prototypes simply adjusted the weapon to use more energy, 
[WHITE]which left the user with only a few shots before needing to recharge.

weapons.name: ASSAULTRIFLEUZI
description:
[WHITE]To develop an 'Assault' version of a weapon prized for its high rate-of-fire seems counter-productive, but the Assault Uzi remains a 
[WHITE]desirable weapon due to its accuracy and damage upgrades.
[WHITE]Marines that enjoy the light weight and impact of pistols, but hate the smaller magazine size often convert Uzis to Assault Uzis, to take advantage of their mag size.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONCHAINGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Chaingun directs heavy firepower onto your opponent making him do the chaingun cha-cha.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Chaingun is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bullet and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONBATTLERIFLE
description:
[WHITE]This Battle Rifle is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bullet and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]Due to the considerable accuracy of the original weapon, this is not much of a drawback, and is an extremely potent weapon.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A plasma rifle shoots multiple rounds of plasma energy -- frying some demon butt![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Plasma Rifle is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bolt and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONMINIGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Spits enough lead into the air to be considered an environmental hazard.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Minigun is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bullet and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONLASERRIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]With no recoil and pinpoint accuracy, it takes a world-class moron to miss while using a laser rifle.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Laser Rifle is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per laser and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]Of course, being a laser weapon, the accuracy loss is laughable.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONNUCLEARPLASMARIFLE
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging plasma rifle -- too bad it can't be manually reloaded.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Nuclear Plasma Rifle is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bolt and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: BURSTCANNONUZI
description:
[WHITE]This Uzi is part of the 'Burst Cannon' series of UAC weapons.
[WHITE]Tuned for greater damage per bullet and limited to three-shot bursts, it sacrifices some accuracy versus the standard model.
[WHITE]The magazine size is doubled from the original weapon, giving you even more dakka to throw around.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A 12g shotgun -- you gotta love its spread.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Shotgun features an ammo manufacturing nanoassembler that builds shells over time from inorganic debris. The pellets 
[WHITE]fired are actually so small and fine that they pierce through enemy armor.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELCOMBATSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Nothing beats the sound of pumping a combat shotgun.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Combat Shotgun features an ammo manufacturing nanoassembler that builds shells over time from inorganic debris. The pellets 
[WHITE]fired are actually so small and fine that they pierce through enemy armor.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELDOUBLESHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Double barreled shotgun -- the perfect weapon for a desperado.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Double Shotgun features an ammo manufacturing nanoassembler that builds shells over time from inorganic debris. The pellets 
[WHITE]fired are actually so small and fine that they pierce through enemy armor.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELSUPERSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]After the first hellish invasion, weapon engineers designed the super shotgun as the world's first firearm designed to kill demons. And boy does it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Super Shotgun features an ammo manufacturing nanoassembler that builds shells over time from inorganic debris. The pellets 
[WHITE]fired are actually so small and fine that they pierce through enemy armor.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELASSAULTSHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Big, bad and ugly.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Assault Shotgun features an ammo manufacturing nanoassembler that builds shells over time from inorganic debris. The pellets 
[WHITE]fired are actually so small and fine that they pierce through enemy armor.

weapons.name: NANOSHRAPNELPLASMASHOTGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]Plasma Shotgun, the best of both worlds![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]This Plasma Shotgun features a fusion generator that replenishes cell ammo over time.
[WHITE]The plasma bolts are much weaker than normal, due to the generator occupying most of the gun, but it no longer needs to reload.

weapons.name: RIPPER
description:
[WHITE]After seeing how useful standard commercially-available chainsaws proved against demons, the UAC set about making one specifically
