[WHITE]for hacking up hordes of slavering hellbeasts.
[WHITE]The result was the Ripper.
[WHITE]Internal compressed air jets for a self-cleaning blade, space-grade carbide alloy teeth, high-torque motor, and 
[WHITE]a reinforced chain guaranteed not to break even on an Arachnotron undercarriage.
[WHITE]When the chips are down and your ammo's gone, the Ripper's got your back.

[WHITE]It's unknown if there is any truth to the rumor that the Ripper actually preserves the wielder through battle after battle.

weapons.name: BIGGESTFUCKINGGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]The Big Fucking Gun. Hell wouldn't be so fun without it.[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The newest in BFG technology, the Biggest Fucking Gun is the last word in single-shot energy weaponry... at least for the moment.
[WHITE]The energy cluster it fires plows right through nearly every enemy in its path, only exploding when it hits a solid surface, dealing 
[WHITE]catastrophic damage in a wide radius, and dealing 'ray' damage to more enemies outside its blast radius than any other entry in the BFG line of weaponry.

[WHITE]The downside? Takes a million years to charge.

weapons.name: NUCLEARBIGGESTFUCKINGGUN
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]A self-charging BFG9000! How much more lucky can you get?[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]In the seemingly endless game of one-upmanship the Energy Weapons Division teams play, the Biggest Fucking Gun now has a Nuclear variant.
[WHITE]The BFG team argues that the Nuclear team is just standing on the shoulders of giants and that the slow recharge time does not offset the infinite 
[WHITE]ammunition, while the Nuclear team argues that weapons development is all about iteration anyway, and that the last thing a Space Marine wants when 
[WHITE]they find a Biggest Fucking Gun is to not have any ammo to use with it.
[WHITE]At this point, the debate typically devolves into accusations of fund misappropriation and titty-twisters.

weapons.name: MOTHERINLAW
description:
[GOLD]''Three feet of death to anything in its path. That's my Mother-In-Law''[INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]-Found scrawled in a Weapons Dept. bathroom stall

[WHITE]While the engineers originally responsible for the M.I.L. were fired after an incident involving a plasma generator being hooked up to a 
[WHITE]toilet, their creation lives on as the be-all, end-all of the UAC's line of rocket launchers.
[WHITE]Through methods not understood by the team salvaging the project, the rocket's eventual damage and blast radius will increase the farther it 
[WHITE]travels, and the launcher generates its own ammo.

weapons.name: AUTOCANNON
description:
[WHITE]The Autocannon's design might imply that it's a rapid-fire weapon similar to the Chaingun or Minigun, but the Autocannon is a different beast altogether.
[WHITE]A metal monster that seems like it came about from a rocket launcher having sex with a chaingun, this war crime fires a single high-velocity shot 
[WHITE]with a heavily damaging area of effect.

weapons.name: PLASMAREFRACTOR
description:
[WHITE]The Plasma Refractor fires a beam of incredible potency, which splits upon contact with a surface, creating smaller projectiles that arc outwards from the original shot.
[WHITE]A handy weapon in tight quarters and around corners.

[WHITE]Recently the weapon has received harsh criticism from a few outspoken marines, claiming the device is too weak to be useful.
[WHITE]The lead scientist responsible for creating the gun has reportedly sealed himself inside his quarters several times, often for entire days, whenever he hears remarks like this.

weapons.name: MEGATONSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]The king of assault weapons, the Megaton is a triple-barrelled shotgun that contains 9 shots internally.
[WHITE]It can fire in single shots, thanks to the rotating barrel mechanism, and it can also fire a triple shot to completely decimate your enemies.
[WHITE]If you have a futuristic shotgun fetish, this thing is right up your alley.

weapons.name: CONQUERORSHOTGUN
description:
[WHITE]A mag-based monster of a shotgun, the Conqueror is aptly name. all fall before the one wielding this gun.
[WHITE]High damage, more pellets and big magazine size make this one of the most versatile and powerful weapons in any Marine's arsenal.

[WHITE]Previous models were able to load armor-piercing pellets, but these were horrifyingly expensive to produce in large quantities, and thus were discontinued.

weapons.name: CLUSTERBOMBLAUNCHER
description: [WHITE]This devastating anti-materiel weapon fires a projectile packed with multiple bomblets, which will streak outwards on impact,
[WHITE]dealing even more damage to any hostiles unfortunate enough to be in their path.

weapons.name: GAUSSRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]A companion to the original Railgun, the Gauss Rifle uses magnetic rail technology to accelerate matter streams at the target.
[WHITE]Desiring to create a magrail weapon with more damaging projectiles, the design team ran into issues with magazine durability due to 
[WHITE]magnetic torsion, and finally settled on a weapon that ditches the magazine entirely, and must be reloaded after every shot.

[WHITE]The weapon can also be slowly charged for additional damage per shot, without using more ammo.

weapons.name: ANTIMATERIELRIFLE
description:
[WHITE]Originally designed to pierce reinforced installations and decimate stationary weaponry, the Anti-materiel Rifle has been given a new lease on life with the demonic invasion.
[WHITE]Its high-explosive frangible rounds have proven highly effective on demon types that have assimilated UAC weaponry and defense systems.
[WHITE]Those intending to use the Anti-Materiel Rifle should keep in mind that it is a bolt-action rifl. the spent casing must be manually ejected after firing, 
[WHITE]making it highly inadvisable for use in crowd control and close-range firefights.

weapons.name: ZEUSCANNON
description:
[WHITE]Originally a fork of the BFG program, the team responsible for the weapon discovered that demonic biosignatures can conduct energy on various wavelengths.
[WHITE]...In plain English, the Zeus Cannon's energy cluster seeks after enemies and reflects off solid surfaces, constantly emmitting tendrils of lethal energy 
[WHITE]until it finally explodes.

[WHITE]Some practical jokers like to reconfigure their Zeus Cannon to home in on friendly targets on a low power setting. not causing them direct harm, 
[WHITE]but certainly punting them around rooms uncontrollably.

weapons.name: VOLTGUN
description:
[WHITE]In an accident while developing the Plasma Shotgun Mk.II, the weapon's plasma focusers overloaded, and it unleashed pure electrical current 
[WHITE]out the muzzle, frying both it and an unfortunate nearby technician.
[WHITE]Inspired by the raw power, a team started work on weaponizing the power of lightning, and created the glory that is the Voltgun.
[WHITE]Numerous failsafes prevent the electric currents from arcing back to the user, making certain no one but the demons will get fried now.

[WHITE]Previous prototypes have, however, been reported frying marines in the heat of battle. It was the one instance where the science team was baffled at marines running faster than lightning.

weapons.name: SUPERMACHINEGUN
description:
[WHITE]Originally designed to be mounted on tripods or vehicles, the Super Machinegun features a colossal magazine and fires 
[WHITE]bullets designed to shred through just about anything.
[WHITE]Some enterprising Marines have started carrying them around, however, seeing how useful they are against the more squishy varieties of hellbeast.

weapons.name: ENERGYSAW
description:
[WHITE]Energy-based melee weaponry was a mainstay of science fiction of the distant past, but the UAC's Energysaw makes fantasy into brutal reality.
[WHITE]Chanelling plasma energy into a finite-length 'blade' creates a melee weapon capable of cleaving hellspawn flesh, bone and metal like the proverbial hot knife through butter.

[WHITE]Of course, unlike a normal melee weapon, this one requires cells to use, which is a small tradeoff for the power it brings.

weapons.name: INFUSIONLAUNCHER
description:
[WHITE]Rather than use traditional explosive charges, the Plascharge Launcher fires a modified rocket containing a multi-plasmatic warhead.
[WHITE]The resulting energy blasts make it the weapon of choice against extremely tough or clustered enemies.
[WHITE]Never underestimate the power of this weapon.

[WHITE]The detonations are quite powerful, so keep your distance, yeah?

weapons.name: PLASMACANNON
description:
[WHITE]The UAC's Plasma Rifle program was a true game-changer for the company, spawning research into many types of energy-based weaponry.
[WHITE]One of the newest is the aptly named Plasma Cannon.
[WHITE]Designed to draw from the user's full supply of energy cells, the Plasma Cannon never needs to be reloaded, and slowly fires 
[WHITE]immensely potent blasts of plasma energy with a wide area of effect.
[WHITE]Some have speculated that the Plasma Cannon be rolled into the BFG program, but it must be noted that the weapon is not possessed of the 
[WHITE]energy field generator found in BFGs, making it best suited for long-range assaults.

weapons.name: HEAVYPULSEBLASTER
description:
[DARKGRAY][INNERQUOTE]This is the standard issue rechargeable energy side-arm. Cool![INNERQUOTE][END]
[WHITE]The newest entry in the Blaster line of compact and deadly energy-based sidearems, this model fires a laser designed to bore a hole through just about anything in its path.
[WHITE]The weapon is not without its downside. namely the fact that this weapon is prone to overheating, something its less potent siblings never had to worry about.
[WHITE]One use of the primary fire will completely deplete the cell, as well as increase the heat level of the gun by a large margin.
[WHITE]The team devised a secondary fire mode which draws less power from the cell and generates less heat, but repeated usage results in a less powerful primary fire until the cell can fully recharge.

weapons.name: LASERMINIGUN
description:
[WHITE]Foreseeing a need for more high-firerate laser weaponry following the release of the Laser Rifle, the latter's development team set to work 
[WHITE]adapting the laser emitters for use in a minigun.
[WHITE]The result is even better that the team expected. cycling three emitters provides a fire rate unheard of in laser weaponry prior to now, while 
[WHITE]keeping the stress on each emitter at tolerable levels.
[WHITE]The excellence of laser accuracy still grips even this ludicrous weapon, allowing the wielder to unleash extremely accurate and punishing laser 
[WHITE]barrages, provided they can keep the gun well-stocked with energy cells.

weapons.name: LASERPULSELAUNCHER
description:
[WHITE]Designed for solo operatives in need of additional fire support, the Defense Drone Launcher expends the propellant from a collection of standard rockets 
[WHITE]to fuel a nano-assembled hover drone equipped with twin plasma guns.
[WHITE]Rather than fire autonomously at foes, the drone directs its attacks towards whatever its owner is currently shooting at, making it a potent ally for a lone space marine.
[WHITE]They can also be deployed as stationary turrets, firing at any enemies they detect independantly of the user.

weapons.name: INCINERATIONDEVICELAUNCHER
description:
[WHITE]This bulky launcher contains one of the newest, and possibly the most bizzare of the UAC Weapons Department's contributions to the war. a rocket-propelled plasma 'flamethrower'.
[WHITE]As the rocket flies, it continuously scans its immediate surroundings for demonic biosignatures, and when it finds a match, it ejects a stream of 
[WHITE]plasma which will reduce even stronger demons to a charred mess.

weapons.name: NANOMANUFACTUREAMMOPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]This Pistol's magazine is replaced with an ammo manufacturing nano-assembler that builds compatible pistol rounds over time from inorganic debris.
[WHITE]The designers of this weapon felt that such a futuristic concept needed to look futuristic too, so they built flashy pulsing lights into it.
[WHITE]They do not make it any more effective, they just look cool.

description:

weapons.name: DEMOLITIONAMMOPISTOL
description:
[WHITE]Part of the 'Demolition Ammo' series of ballistic weapons, this Pistol fires explosive rounds that detonate on impact, heavily damaging 
[WHITE]the target and dealing splash damage to any hostiles in the immediate vicinity.
[WHITE]The explosive damage scales based on the firerate of the gun, but the size of the explosion is constant between weapons.
[WHITE]The faster a weapon fires, the less damage the explosion will deal.
